page.title: 20Tendley Quarry,Eaglesfield.
page.content: This{limestone quarry}is owned by the Tarmac International Company .It is 30 acres of land. The quarry is 52 feet deep . There are 18 men and one woman working there.{Tarmac Roadstone has worked there for about 18 years. The limestone is used for roads, con- struction and agriculteral purposes. The process begins by taking off the surface soil. Then holes are drilled to blast the rock. The explosives that they use are called {anfo}and{slurry. The rock is transported to a primary crusher then to a secondary crusher. These break it down into 8 different sizes. It is stored in 1000 tonne bins before being sold. Some chippings, how -ever are mixed with{Bitumen}to make road surfacing materials. The stone is carted away in 10,16 and 20 ton trucks.
